definitions.definition: Not open about one's sexual orientation, romantic orientation, or gender identity.
(by extension) Not open about some aspect of one's identity, tendency or fondness; secret.
To shut away for private discussion.
definitions.example: The ambassador has been closeted with the prime minister all afternoon. We're all worried what will be announced when they exit.

definitions.definition: To put into a private place for a secret interview or interrogation.
To shut up in, or as in, a closet for concealment or confinement.

definitions.example: He's spent all day closeted in his room.
